title: Legend of Heavenly Tear: Phoenix Warriors
overview: Adapted from the novel "Incomparable Phoenix", Legend of Heavenly Tear: Phoenix Warriors revolves around the Heavenly Tear, a necklace, which is an extraterrestrial object with the power to destroy the Earth. The series follows the love triangle between Nie Wu Shuang, who possess the necklace, and two brothers, Xiao Feng Qing and Xiao Feng Ming in their quest to protect the Heavenly Tear.
